name: Star Eliminate Kings
description:
Star Eliminate Blast is a fun and challenging game. Easy to learn, but hard to master.

The object is to clear the board by removing the same color stars(tiles) .The more stars you clear in a single move, the higher your score.

Features:
- 50 challenging levels
- Beautiful Retina Graphics
- Easy to use
- Four Props：
+ Line：crush one line
+ row : crush one row
+ bomb : crush 3*3 grids
+ color : crush one color tiles
